title: Payne Capital: A Hot and Sexy Erotic Novella
description: **Contains strong language and sexual content.**  The debut novella from erotica author Sloane Howell and first in the Payne Capital series...  Devyn White and his fiancee Meredith--the perfect All-American couple--have just moved to New York City following his acceptance of his dream job working at Payne Capital, a private equity firm ran by Rebekah Payne, a billionaire math and finance prodigy. Devyn soon realizes his dream job isn't all that he imagined as he is thrust into ethical dilemmas involving an ex-husband, an out of control boss, the operations of the firm, and his own personal relationship with Meredith. When the heat is turned up he must soon make difficult choices that will affect the rest of his life and possibly hurt the people he loves in the process. This page turning, steamy, erotic thriller is guaranteed to keep your hands wandering and your head spinning...
author: Sloane Howell
